name: hbm-inspection-system
description: HBM Car Inspection System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.render-build: cd frontend && NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
